name: Image Enhancement
description: Improve the quality and visual appearance of images using techniques like sharpening, denoising, and contrast adjustment.
usecase: Used in medical imaging, satellite imagery, and improving the visual quality of consumer photographs.
challenges: Challenges include preserving image details while removing noise, avoiding artifacts, and subjective quality assessment.
popular_methods: Common methods include histogram equalization, bilateral filtering, wavelet transforms, and deep learning-based approaches.
